title: Five-Star Mexico All-Villa Celebrity Resort with Exclusive Beach Club
description: For a touch of Hollywood 1950's glam mixed with laidback Mexican beach resort vibes, there's no better place to stay than Las Brisas Acapulco, located on Mexico's Pacific Coast. Brimming with character and colour, delight in the hotel's white walls and pink trimmings, retro phone boxes, pink-striped Jeeps and celebrity handprints including Tom Cruise and Sylvester Stallone. Enjoy a secluded stay on the hilltops of Acapulco overlooking the sparkling bay from La Concha Beach Club, an exclusive club for guests featuring a swim-up bar, swimming pool, two saltwater grottos and sun loungers. There are four sumptuous restaurants and bars located onsite to choose from: if you'd like to enjoy the views of Acapulco from a refined setting, spend a romantic evening at Bellavista Restaurant, then head to Bellavista Bar for aperitifs and live piano music.
offer_address: 5255 Carretera Escénica Fraccionamiento Las Brisas, Acapulco, Guerrero, 39867 México
